content: **knitted top with lace pattern in drops muskat the piece is worked top down with raglan and short sleeves sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no r-767 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 250-300-350-350-400-450 g colour 07 light yellow **knitting gauge ** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm and 60 cm or 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 60 cm and 80 cm for moss stitch needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
